definition: to ride as a passenger/to travel by (car, plane etc)
to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed
surname Cheng
old variant of 乘[cheng2]

sentences.english: During the depression, I used to hop freights at least once a month.
sentences.chinese: 大萧条时期，我一月至少一次要偷偷搭乘货运列车。

sentences.english: Yesterday, I hitchhiked my way to a small village several miles away from London.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我一路搭乘便车去离伦敦几英里外的一个小镇。

sentences.english: I could always catch the bus up later in Istanbul or Sofia.
sentences.chinese: 我可以搭乘后面的巴士到伊斯坦布尔或索菲亚。

sentences.english: I came to school by foot today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天搭乘脚丫子去上学。

sentences.english: The motorist picked up a couple of servicemen along the highway .
sentences.chinese: 这个乘汽车的人在公路上让两个军人搭乘便车。

sentences.english: These satellites will go as piggyback on PSLV's (Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle), officials said.
sentences.chinese: 有官员称，这些卫星将搭乘印度的极轨卫星运载火箭。

sentences.english: You can take No.28 bus at the nearest bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在最近的车站搭乘28路车。

sentences.english: How long does it take to the destination by MRT?
sentences.chinese: 搭乘捷运到达目的地需要多少时间？

sentences.english: The Mayas do not just disappeared, they were evacuated by spaceships and flew away.
sentences.chinese: 玛雅人并非突然消失了，而是搭乘宇宙飞船撤走了。

sentences.english: You can take metro, it is Yonggwang station of Chollima line.
sentences.chinese: 您可搭乘平壤地铁，千里马线，荣光车站。

sentences.english: Where do I get the bus for the airport?
sentences.chinese: 什么地方我可搭乘往机场的大巴？

sentences.english: I planned to take the sleeper train there.
sentences.chinese: 我计划在那儿搭乘卧车。

sentences.english: I returned by JAL370, which is my usual flight.
sentences.chinese: 我搭乘常搭的jal370班机回来。

sentences.english: African Americans constituted 70% of those who used the bus regularly.
sentences.chinese: 非洲裔美国人在定期搭乘公交车的人口中占70%。

sentences.english: Your bus will leave from gate six.
sentences.chinese: 您搭乘的巴士将自六号门发车。

definition: to ride (in a vehicle)
to ride as a passenger (in a car, boat, plane etc)
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
(of a bus, train etc) to leave for/heading for
to ride (in a car or carriage)/to drive/to motor
bus (loanword)/motor coach
to arrive/to reach (a destination)
to change train (plane, bus etc)/transfer between modes of transport
to embark/to travel by ship/to ferry
ferry boat
airliner/(regular) flight/CL:趟[tang4],次[ci4],班[ban1]
bound for
shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
to call at/to stop at/berth
to leave for/to proceed towards/to go
to carry/to convey/delivery/supply
